actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Joint resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that former U.S. officials traveling abroad should not be considered to be spokesmen for the United States unless officially designated as such.

summary.text: States that, unless officially designated as such, former U.S. officials traveling abroad should not be considered to be spokesman for the foreign or domestic policy of the United States Government.

titles.title: Joint resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that former U.S. officials traveling abroad should not be considered to be spokesmen for the United States unless officially designated as such.
